name: Return to Earth (itch) (DanBolton)
description:
This is my game for the 2020 epic mega jam, This game is about  humanity coming back to earth after leaving it 40 years ago, you must survive from the creature which roam the planet, repair the 5 beacons to summon the mothership home.

Jam theme - its been along time but were not done yet

My game fits this theme as its meant to be it been along time since humans have been on the planet but they have come back as they arent done with earth yet
